channel.title: Ens on Semantic Web for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Ens on Semantic Web for Hugo

item.title: Semantic Web for Hugo
item.description: Intro Semantic Web for Hugo adds structured data and linked data into a Hugo-powered website. Through it search engines can easily read the data of a Hugo-powered website and establish relationships between objects. This enables search engines to intelligently store information about a website and use it to increase a website’s exposure in search results. For this project, we chose to implement Schema.org’s Vocabulary by adding JSON-LD markup automatically. In areas where custom input is required, we took advantage of Hugo’s shortcode feature. Latest version: v1.1.0: ᜐᜎᜋᜆ᜔ (salamat) released on 2012-11-15. History v1.0.0 &ld
